subject: Mappings of the Read Alphabet to IPA and to various non-English languages
msgSnippet: Has anyone created a working mapping between the Read Alphabet and IPA? And various non-English languages have a much closer association between the written
messageBody:
Has anyone created a working mapping between the Read Alphabet and IPA?

And various non-English languages have a much closer association
between the written and spoken languages, such as Spanish. And
various others have much more straightforward vowels, such as
Japanese.

Has anyone done any work on mapping the Read Alphabet onto those languages?

..m

Has anyone created a working mapping between the Read Alphabet and IPA?

And various non-English languages have a much closer association
between the written and spoken languages, such as Spanish.  And
various others have much more straightforward vowels, such as

Has anyone done any work on mapping the Read Alphabet onto those languages?
